languages.text: "Никто о нас, сирых, не думает... знай, работай да помалкивай..."
"No one spares a thought for us down here... We're just supposed to work and keep our mouths shut..."
languages.original_text: "Никто о нас, сирых, не думает... знай, работай да помалкивай..."

traits.locale_text: "No one spares a thought for us down here... We're just supposed to work and keep our mouths shut..."
"No one spares a thought for us down here... We're just supposed to work and keep our mouths shut..."
"No one spares a thought for us down here... We're just supposed to work and keep our mouths shut..."
"No one spares a thought for us down here... We're just supposed to work and keep our mouths shut..."

languages.text: “根本没人在乎我们底层人过着什么样的生活……我们只要好好工作，把嘴闭上就好了……”
languages.original_text: "No one spares a thought for us down here... We're just supposed to work and keep our mouths shut..."

traits.locale_text: “根本没人在乎我们底层人过着什么样的生活……我们只要好好工作，把嘴闭上就好了……”

languages.text: «Nadie piensa en los de aquí abajo... Se supone que tenemos que callarnos y trabajar...».
languages.original_text: "No one spares a thought for us down here... We're just supposed to work and keep our mouths shut..."

traits.locale_text: «Nadie piensa en los de aquí abajo... Se supone que tenemos que callarnos y trabajar...».

languages.text: 「ここでは誰も私たちのことを気にかけてくれない…黙って働いていればいいんだ…」
languages.original_text: "No one spares a thought for us down here... We're just supposed to work and keep our mouths shut..."

traits.locale_text: 「ここでは誰も私たちのことを気にかけてくれない…黙って働いていればいいんだ…」

languages.text: "Niemand verschwendet einen Gedanken an uns hier unten ... Wir sollten einfach arbeiten und den Mund halten ..."
languages.original_text: "No one spares a thought for us down here... We're just supposed to work and keep our mouths shut..."

traits.locale_text: "Niemand verschwendet einen Gedanken an uns hier unten ... Wir sollten einfach arbeiten und den Mund halten ..."

languages.text: « Personne ne s'intéresse jamais à nous... Trimer sans broncher, voilà notre lot quotidien... »
languages.original_text: "No one spares a thought for us down here... We're just supposed to work and keep our mouths shut..."

traits.locale_text: « Personne ne s'intéresse jamais à nous... Trimer sans broncher, voilà notre lot quotidien... »

languages.text: "Burada kimsenin aklına bile gelmiyoruz... Çalışıp çenemizi açmasak onlara hava hoş..."
languages.original_text: "No one spares a thought for us down here... We're just supposed to work and keep our mouths shut..."

traits.locale_text: "Burada kimsenin aklına bile gelmiyoruz... Çalışıp çenemizi açmasak onlara hava hoş..."
